titles.title: A resolution electing Lula Johnson Davis, of Maryland, as Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.
A resolution electing Lula Johnson Davis, of Maryland, as Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects Lula Johnson Davis, of Maryland, Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.
